td.content: s:pt with mild flatulence, mild cramping, mild abdominal pain and Stomach. he has had several such episodes over past 3 years. patient is a 52 year old white m sanitation worker. denies any alcohol use he states he has never smoked a cigarette in his life o:Height 73 in, Weight 170 lbs, Temperature 97.9 F, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16, all lung fields, Abdomen = mild epigastric tenderness, distension, no hepatomegaly a:Irritable Bowel p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed dicyclomine - 20 mg 4 x day, and ordered CBC.
